mapper.insert: insert into server_manager(username, userpwd, ip, port, filepath, servicename, execustatus, rmk) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{servicename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{execustatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.delete: delete from server_manager where ip= #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and port= #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update server_manager
userpwd=#{userpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ip=#{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
port=#{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
